page.title: 16SHOPPING IN CLACTON
page.content: There are many different kinds of shops in Clacton. Some are shoe shops where you go to get footwear to your fancy. Many people own their own burger bars now,like Wimpy and Mcdonalds all in the race for publicity.Places like Marks and Spencer, Woolworth and Tesco sell all kinds of items,from gardening tools,to baked beans.These shops are called Supermarkets.Some shops sell books where you can buy them instead of borrowing them from the library.There are also sweet shops where there are a number of coloured sweets.Many of the shops in Clacton cater for the holiday trade, selling items like beachballs and sun hats, buckets and spades. Clacton is fortunate in havinga branch of many High Street chains, such as W.H.Smith, Boots, Halfords etc.
